name: Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Tides of Fate Remastered
description: The world of Cora beckons once again in this HD Remaster of the game that began the saga of the Dark Lord, Magus Drakhen Lee!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual-Core 1.8Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Quad-Core 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
